meanings.definition: The distinctive atmosphere or quality that seems to surround and be generated by a person, thing, or place.
meanings.sent1: The aurae of the forest was peaceful and calming.
meanings.sent2: She could feel the aurae of excitement in the air before the concert.
meanings.sent3: The aurae of the bakery made everyone crave fresh bread.
meanings.sent4: His aurae was so warm and welcoming, it felt like a hug.
meanings.sent5: The aurae of the beach was filled with the scent of salt and sunscreen.

meanings.definition: A field of energy surrounding a living being.
meanings.sent1: The healer could see the aurae surrounding the patient.
meanings.sent2: Animals are said to have protective aurae around them.
meanings.sent3: The aurae of the cat seemed to shimmer in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her aurae glowed brightly, indicating her positive energy.
meanings.sent5: The aurae of the old tree extended far beyond its branches.
